tns:patch.author: apopescu
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_tertiaryprogram_level_8; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_tertiaryprogram_level_8 AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, COALESCE(level.name, '#') AS name, apl.id8 AS amp_program_id, SUM(a.program_percentage) as percentage, COUNT(*) - COUNT(a.program_percentage) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_activity_program a JOIN ni_all_programs_with_levels apl ON a.amp_program_id = apl.amp_theme_id LEFT JOIN amp_theme level ON level.amp_theme_id = apl.id8 JOIN amp_program_settings aps ON aps.amp_program_settings_id = a.program_setting WHERE aps.name = 'Tertiary Program' GROUP BY a.amp_activity_id, apl.id8, level.amp_theme_id;
